title: Hlimin Lalpaah lawm ula
lyrics:
Hlimin Lalpaah lawm ula,
Nangni lungngaihna tuarte u;
Amah chu thlangin pawm ula,
Kiantir r'u, lungngaihna zawng chu.

Lawm r'u, lawm r'u, }2
Hlimin Lalpaah lo lawm r'u }

Amah chu Lal a ni, lawm r'u,
Lei leh vanah ro a rel si;
A kuta awm kan ni, lawm r'u,
A nun pea tlante kan ni.

Min vengin a hnai fo, lawm r'u.
A chenna van sang mah sela;
Khawngaih kutin min hruai thin a,
Min thlen ang, a vanramah khian.

Thlipui leh khua dur mah sela,
Thlir r'u, vanram - Lal lenna chu;
Chutah rome a kai vel a,
Vanho thianghlim zai vawrna chu.
